file.name: Excel
file.description: Excel is a popular spreadsheet program used with data like numbers and formulas, text, and drawing shapes.

file.name: HTML
file.description: HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is a text-based approach to describing how content contained within an HTML file is structured.

file.name: JPG
file.description: JPG is a widely used compressed image format for containing digital images.

file.name: MOV
file.description: Video file containing an "elementary stream," or raw video data.

file.name: MP3
file.description: The MP3 file extension is a widely used digital audio container that has revolutionized the music playback, sharing and distributing industry.

file.name: PDF
file.description: PDF is an abbreviation that stands for Portable Document Format.
